animeDescription: In the year 2xxx, development of information are going so fast, humans being are drowning in the sea information. This leads to a situation where people can not find the necessary information. The only hope to solve this problem is the navigator program, Hacka Doll.  (Source: Anime Bibly)
animeCharacters: ['Hacka Doll No.3', 'Hacka Doll No.2', 'Hacka Doll No.1', 'Kurami']
